snippet: Riverside Skate Park was designed in the 1990s by the New York skateboarding pioneer Andy Kessler, who died in 2009. But it had fallen into disrepair until friends of Mr. Kessler took on a refurbishing project in his honor.
abstract: Riverside Skate Park, which had fallen into disrepair, was designed in 1990s by New York skateboarding pioneer Andy Kessler, who died in 2009;  friends of Kessler took on refurbishing project in his honor.
lead_paragraph: Riverside Skate Park was designed in the 1990s by the New York skateboarding pioneer Andy Kessler, who died in 2009. But it had fallen into disrepair until friends of Mr. Kessler took on a refurbishing project in his honor.

headline.main: Preserving a Skateboarding Park and Its Creator’s Memory
headline.print_headline: Preserving a Skateboarding Park, and the Memory of Its Creator
